TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpUtility extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在处理 Web 请求时用于编码和解码 URL 的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由类在内部使用 ，该类的方法和属性通过内部 ASP.NET 对象公开。The class is used internally by the class, whose methods and properties are exposed through the intrinsic ASP.NET object. 此外， 类包含无法从访问的编码和解码实用工具方法 。Additionally, the class contains encoding and decoding utility methods that are not accessible from the . 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的 、 和 方法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the , and methods of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpUtilityExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtilityExample/cs/httputilityexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpUtilityExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtilityExample/vb/httputilityexample.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开用于编码和解码基于字符串的 url、url 标记和路径的方法。The class exposes methods for encoding and decoding string based URLs, URL tokens, and paths. 由类在内部使用 。The is used internally by the class.

summary.span: 将字符串最小限度地转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。

span.span: Minimally converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对插入到 HTML 特性值中的字符进行编码。The method encodes characters appropriate for insertion into an HTML attribute value. 此方法的字符串结果 应仅用于带双引号的特性。The string result from the method should be used only for double-quoted attributes. 使用带有单引号属性的方法时可能会出现安全问题 。Security issues might arise when using the method with single-quoted attributes.

A output stream.

summary.span: 将字符串最小限度地转换为 HTML 编码的字符串，并将编码的字符串发送到 输出流。

span.span: Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string and sends the encoded string to a output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只将双引号转换 ( ") ，单引号 (" ) ，& ( # A0) 和左尖括号 ( # A1) 转换为等效的字符实体。The method converts only double quotation marks ("), single quotation marks ('), ampersands (&), and left angle brackets (<) to equivalent character entities. 此方法的速度要快得多 。It is considerably faster than the method. 此方法的字符串结果 应仅用于带双引号的特性。The string result from the method should be used only for double-quoted attributes. 使用带有单引号属性的方法时可能会出现安全问题 。Security issues might arise when using the method with single-quoted attributes.

span.span: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

summary.span: 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。

span.span: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string HtmlDecode (string s);

span.span: The string to decode.

summary.span: 将已经为 HTTP 传输进行过 HTML 编码的字符串转换为已解码的字符串。

span.span: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.
A decoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. HTML 编码将 HTML 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;HTML 解码反转编码。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到文本块中时，会将字符 \< and > 编码为，并将其编码为 `<` `>` HTTP 传输。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and > are encoded as `<` and `>` for HTTP transmission. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 类的和 方法 。The following code example demonstrates the and methods of the class. 使用方法对输入字符串进行编码 。The input string is encoded using the method. 然后，使用方法对获取的编码字符串进行解码 。The encoded string obtained is then decoded using the method. [!code-csharp[HttpUtility_HtmlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_HtmlDecode/CS/httputility_htmldecode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpUtility_HtmlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_HtmlDecode/VB/httputility_htmldecode.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void HtmlDecode (string? s, System.IO.TextWriter output);
.method public static hidebysig void HtmlDecode(string s, class System.IO.TextWriter output) cil managed
Public Shared Sub HtmlDecode (s As String, output As TextWriter)
public: static void HtmlDecode(System::String ^ s, System::IO::TextWriter ^ output);
static member HtmlDecode : string * System.IO.TextWriter -> unit
public static void HtmlDecode (string s, System.IO.TextWriter output);

span.span: The string to decode.
A stream of output.

HTML 编码将 HTML 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;HTML 解码反转编码。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到文本块中时，会将字符 \< and > 编码为，并将其编码为 `<` `>` HTTP 传输。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and > are encoded as `<` and `>` for HTTP transmission. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

span.span: The query string to parse.

summary.span: 使用 编码将查询字符串分析成一个 。

span.span: Parses a query string into a using encoding.
A of query parameters and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 格式分析返回的、URL 编码的字符中的查询字符串 ，并将同一查询字符串参数的多个匹配项作为单个项列出，并用逗号分隔每个值。The method uses format to parse the query string In the returned , URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法使用可能包含用户输入的查询字符串，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。The method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 在返回的的一项中合并了同一查询字符串变量的多个匹配项 。Multiple occurrences of the same query string variable are consolidated in one entry of the returned . [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpUtility_ParseQueryString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_ParseQueryString/cs/httputility_parsequerystring.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpUtility_ParseQueryString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_ParseQueryString/vb/httputility_parsequerystring.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在返回的中 ，URL 编码的字符会解码，同一查询字符串参数的多个匹配项将作为单个项列出，并用逗号分隔每个值。In the returned , URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法使用可能包含用户输入的查询字符串，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。The method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)).

A decoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，字符 \< and > 将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，字符 \< and > 将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于对整个 URL 进行编码，包括查询字符串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当字符 \< and > 嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，它们将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

related.span: 如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用于字符串来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public static string UrlEncode (string str);
.method public static hidebysig string UrlEncode(string str) cil managed
Public Shared Function UrlEncode (str As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ UrlEncode(System::String ^ str);
static member UrlEncode : string -> string

span.span: The text to encode.

summary.span: 对 URL 字符串进行编码。

span.span: Encodes a URL string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于对整个 URL 进行编码，包括查询字符串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果在不进行编码的情况下传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream without encoding, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当字符 \< and > 嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，它们将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 您可以使用方法或方法对 URL 进行编码 。You can encode a URL using with the method or the method. 但是，这些方法返回不同的结果。However, the methods return different results. 方法将每个空格字符转换为加号字符 (+) 。The method converts each space character to a plus character (+). 方法将每个空格字符转换为字符串 "%20"，后者表示十六进制表示法中的空格。The method converts each space character into the string "%20", which represents a space in hexadecimal notation. 编码 url 的路径部分时，请使用方法，以确保解码的 url 一致，而不管哪个平台或浏览器执行解码。Use the method when you encode the path portion of a URL in order to guarantee a consistent decoded URL, regardless of which platform or browser performs the decoding. 默认情况下，该方法使用 utf-8 编码。The method uses UTF-8 encoding by default. 因此，使用 方法可提供与使用方法相同的结果 ，并将指定 为第二个参数。Therefore, using the method provides the same results as using the method and specifying as the second parameter. 是 在运行时从 ASP.NET 应用程序访问方法的一种简便方法。 is a convenient way to access the method at run time from an ASP.NET application. 在内部， 使用 方法对字符串进行编码。Internally, uses the method to encode strings. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

related.span: 如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用于字符串来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当字符 \< and > 嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，它们将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，字符 \< and > 将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

related.span: 如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用于字符串来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

The number of bytes to encode.

summary.span: 将字节数组转换为 URL 编码的字节数组，从数组中指定位置开始，以指定字节数继续。

span.span: Converts an array of bytes into a URL-encoded array of bytes, starting at the specified position in the array and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
An encoded array of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入 HTTP 流中的字符（如空格和标点符号），则可能会在接收端对其进行错误解释。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将 URL 中不允许的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，字符 \< and > 将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

URL 编码将 URL 中无效的字符转换为字符实体等效项;URL 解码会反转编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not valid in a URL to character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，嵌入到要在 URL 中传输的文本块中时，字符 \< and > 将编码为% 3c 和% 3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e.
